function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapidly changing policy and service environment","Impact":"Difficulty in keeping up with regulations and guidelines for disease control measures","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of policy changes and proactive adjustment of disease control measures","Technologies":"Policy monitoring tools, data analytics for trend analysis","People":"Public and private transportation authorities, city planners","Owner":"Public health departments, transportation authorities"},{"Description":"New technological and service innovations","Impact":"Introduction of new modes of transportation may introduce new disease transmission vectors","Mitigation":"Conducting risk assessments and implementing targeted disease control measures for new technologies","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, ventilation and air filtration systems, sanitization technologies","People":"Consumers, transportation providers, urban planners","Owner":"Health and safety regulators, transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of suitable modes for Responsible Transport","Impact":"Limited options may lead to overcrowding and increased disease transmission risk","Mitigation":"Investment in diverse and accessible transport options, public awareness and education on alternative transport modes","Technologies":"Urban planning models, transport network optimization algorithms","People":"Public transit users, pedestrians, cyclists","Owner":"Transportation authorities, urban planners"}]}
